title: 'I don't want to see CJ Stander playing for Ireland' - Paul Kimmage
text: 'I don't want to see CJ Stander playing for Ireland' - Paul Kimmage Independent.ie Award-winning sports journalist Paul Kimmage has hit out at the three-year residency rule which allows foreign-born players to play rugby for Ireland. http://www.independent.ie/sport/rugby/international-rugby/i-dont-want-to-see-cj-stander-playing-for-ireland-paul-kimmage-35354630.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35354629.ece/57180/AUTOCROP/h342/CJ.jpg Award-winning sports journalist Paul Kimmage has hit out at the three-year residency rule which allows foreign-born players to play rugby for Ireland.
